name: ZombieFPS
description:
This is a call of duty zombies inspired shooter. 

Implemented Features

Movement:

Walking (WASD)

Sprint(Shift)

Jump(Space)

Stance Change(Alt tap or hold)

Shoot Laser (LMB)

Interaction:

Interact (T)

Zombie Can take damage

In Progress:

Zombie Behavior

Player Damage

Equipment System
